CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 24, 1946, pg. 4, reads: "Final Tribute - Funeral services were held Tuesday at Holy Cross Episcopal Church for Mrs. Helen Brown Fowler, prominent Pittsburgher, who resided at 728 Adelaide Street. She died last Saturday in Women's Hospital after a short illness.  Pallbearers were, left to right, Lorenzo Hill, Elmo Washington, George Poe, Byron Peters, Clyde Schatzman and Ralph Barnett. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Men and women, including Harry Fowler, Betty Fowler, and Jimmy Fowler in center, leaving Holy Cross Episcopal Church, for funeral of Helen Brown Fowler
